name: Health Expert
description: Increases the character's base maximum HP by 25%.

name: Sturdy Grip
description: Allows the character to hold a melee two-handed weapon in one hand as well as wield a Shield regardless of current Class.

name: No Flank
description: All attacks targeting this character are considered to be from the front.

name: Life Font
description: Character recovers 4 + Level/4 HP with each step taken.

name: Resilience
description: Any debuffs applied to the character will last 1 less turn.

name: Defense Expert
description: Increases the character's base DEF value by 32 + 1.5*Level.

name: Leech Life
description: Character's Regular Attacks absorb some of the damage dealt.

name: Blood Mark
description: Character gains stacking 0.2x damage bonus from each time they attack the same target they did last turn. Bonus reset upon changing target.

name: Into the Fray
description: Damage dealt increases by 0.125x to 0.85x for every adjacent enemy. More adjacent enemies means a higher increase.

name: Bloodlust
description: Damage dealt increases the lower the character's current HP is.

name: Cautious Step
description: Character is immune to traps as well as to {icon-Root.png}Root, {icon-Slow.png}Slow.

name: Dual Wield
description: Character can equip two weapons or two shields at the same time. When using Skills, the attack granted by the 2nd weapon will not apply.

name: Know Weakness

name: Evasion Up

name: Attack Expert

name: Exploit Weakness
description: Increases Critical Hit damage by 50%.

name: Concentration
description: Increases the character's accuracy by 20% when taking any offensive action (does not apply to Steal Abilities).

name: Height Advantage
description: Increases damage done by 0.04x for each height value the character has over the target (max .4x damage).

name: Item Potency
description: When using an item, it will double the normal potency.

name: Quick Fingers
description: Situational commands (such as Open, Gather, Climb, Activate, etc.) do not cost an action to use.

name: Blessed One
description: Every time the character uses a single target healing Ability on a target other than themselves, they are healed for 0.5x of the amount.

name: Mana Font
description: Character recovers 1 MP with each step taken.

name: Side Effects
description: Using an Ability or Regular Attack to successfully apply a buff also restores .3x HP to the target, and a debuff also applies .25x HP damage to the target.

name: Resistance Expert
description: Increases the character's base RES value by 24 + 1.5*Level.

name: Eruptor
description: Any turn the character does not deal damage, they build a 0.18x bonus to their damage (up to 0.72x). The bonus is used up upon dealing damage.

name: Economy
description: All Abilities with MP cost have that cost reduced by 1/3.

name: Fortitude
description: Character is immune to Injuries as well as {icon-Poison.png}Poison, {icon-Bleed.png}Bleed, and {icon-Weaken.png}Weaken.

name: Permanence

name: Smart Casting
description: Offensive multi-target Abilities will not include allies as possible targets and helpful multi-target Abilities will not include enemies as possible targets.

name: Boon
description: Upon felling an enemy, the character will be guaranteed Critical Hit on their next action. Boon will wear off at the end of the next turn even if it wasn't used.
